articles.description:
Re ✍️ #30daysoftext is continuing strong.
A month-long write-a-thon. Each day, our official X account (this one) will tweet out a topic: your tasks is to write about it and share your post in the replies.
Best submissions win POAPs and other prizes. Here's day 11

Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀): #30daysoftext Day 11
Discuss a decentralized finance protocol 💹
It can be a short article, a Twitter thread, or even just a tweet. Just ensure to explain it well.
Reply with a link to the text, so we can find it 🤫

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @Jamiescript explains what onchain NFTs bring to the table!

Jamiebones: #30daysoftext
Day 10: Write about on-chain NFTs
on-chain NFTs have everything stored directly on the blockchain. This includes the NFT's metadata, such as name, description, attributes, and even the media file itself. This direct storage offers several key advantages:
articles.title: Re @Jamiescript explains what onchain NFTs bring to the table!

articles.author: Developer DAO (🧱, 🚀)
articles.description:
Re @iaminiekanem delved into NFTs and their spec on Ethereum 👀

Ini Abasi Ekanem: 🔷🔹Onchain Non-Fungible Tokens (NFTs)🔹🔷
Onchain NFTs are a decentralized and secure way to represent ownership of assets.
They are unique cryptographic tokens that are stored directly on a blockchain, ensuring transparency, immutability, and irrefutable proof of ownership.
articles.title: Re @iaminiekanem delved into NFTs and their spec on Ethereum 👀

#30daysoftext @developer_dao
articles.title: On chain? Off chain? @PSkinnerTech clarifies!
